scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name repoint-life
scripts.db:seed:local: wrangler d1 execute repoint-production --local --file=./seed.sql && wrangler d1 execute repoint-production --local --file=./seed_extended.sql
scripts.db:seed:prod: wrangler d1 execute repoint-production --remote --file=./seed.sql && wrangler d1 execute repoint-production --remote --file=./seed_extended.sql
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed:local
scripts.git:init: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit'
